title: [GAMEPLAY] in ascension, Tahm Kench Can use ult to reach base pad and buy without dying
body: I played an ascension game where Tahm Kench was using his ult after he ascended to return to base,  shop, and regen his health all while in the safety of base. I'm pretty sure you didn't intend this.

replies.body: I noticed this as well. This is a bug. Please fix this! Thank you!
